item.title: About
item.description: I am a Software Engineer at Google working on Large Language Models and their applications to AI Overviews for Search. I’m fortunate to have been at Google through the golden age of Language Models, and got to contribute to multiple generations of LLMs - Multitask Unified Model (MUM), and Gemini. I also have deep domain expertise in Search, having led several highly impactful launches to Google Search, particularly on query and document understanding.
